overview: Jay is an Austrian down on his luck...he just got his girlfriend pregnant but has no money. His father suggests that he go to America and make money - that way he can send his earning back to the mother-to-be. Jay has one more problem...He is a sex addict! Once he gets to America, he ends up having sex with someone from every job he gets...resulting in him getting fired! Will Jay find his true calling?? Could it be actually getting paid for sex??!! It is "The American Dream" after all!
title: The American Dream
